metadata.description: People involved in Hovfaret 13 project - enriched with bios from source documents
enrichment_sources: Preprosjekt Natural State for Urbania Eiendom proposal (Feb 2024)

gabriel_boen.name: Gabriel Bøen
gabriel_boen.title: Project Lead / Digital Strategy
gabriel_boen.role_in_project: Project Coordinator - leads day-to-day coordination, digital strategy, and stakeholder communications

einar_holthe.name: Einar Kleppe Holthe
einar_holthe.title: CEO / Strategy Lead
einar_holthe.role_in_project: Strategic leadership, high-level stakeholder engagement, sustainability strategy
einar_holthe.bio: CEO of Natural State AS and strategic leader with expertise in place economics (stedsøkonomi) and market economics. Initiated the Hovfaret 13 preproject in February 2024 with a vision for 'omtenksom verdiutvikling' (thoughtful value development). Key architect of the transformation strategy arguing against demolition in favor of rehabilitation. Leads client relationships with Urbania Eiendom.

andreas_thorsnes.name: Andreas Thorsnes
andreas_thorsnes.title: Project Developer
andreas_thorsnes.role_in_project: Client representative - owns project decisions, financial oversight, developer perspective
andreas_thorsnes.bio: Project developer at Urbania Eiendom AS, property owner of Hovfaret 13. Key decision-maker on project direction and financial investments. Has been actively involved since project inception in March 2024. Responsible for evaluating development scenarios and making final calls on transformation vs. demolition approach. Works closely with R21 Arkitekter on architectural solutions.

thomas_thorsen.name: Thomas Thorsen
thomas_thorsen.title: Architect
thomas_thorsen.role_in_project: Lead architect - transformation design, scenario development, regulatory drawings
thomas_thorsen.bio: Lead architect from R21 Arkitekter (Rådhusgata 21, 0158 Oslo). Responsible for all architectural design work on Hovfaret 13 transformation. Developed multiple development scenarios including the Omsorg+ concept with 70-100 elderly care units. Created comprehensive floor plans (A20 series) showing rehabilitation and extension options. Key technical contributor on building assessment showing the structure was designed for 12 floors but built with only 5, supporting the extension argument.

severin_docker.name: Severin Døcker
severin_docker.title: Communications / Developer
severin_docker.role_in_project: Communications support and technical development. Contributed to SoMe posts for Hovfaret 13 and nabolagsmøte communications.
key_deliverables: Post SoMe Natural state / NCC - Hovfaret

linda_marie_aas.name: Linda Marie Aas
linda_marie_aas.title: Project Manager / Sustainability Lead
linda_marie_aas.role_in_project: Project management for Hovfaret 13 - responsible for deliverables, stakeholder coordination, nabolagsmøte planning, and sustainability documentation. Key coordinator for Notion-based project tracking.
linda_marie_aas.bio: Project manager at Natural State AS with focus on sustainability and stakeholder engagement. Led the planning and execution of the neighborhood meeting (nabolagsmøte) on October 14, 2025. Primary responsible for leietaker dialogues, presentation development, and project deliverables tracking. Works closely with Kamran Surizehi on operational project management.

kamran_surizehi.name: Kamran Surizehi
kamran_surizehi.title: Architect / Project Coordinator
kamran_surizehi.role_in_project: Operational project coordinator for Hovfaret 13 - responsible for visual production, nabolagsmøte materials, stakeholder mapping, and coordination with R21 Arkitekter. Key contributor to Notion-based project tracking.
kamran_surizehi.bio: Architect at Natural State AS with background in project coordination and visual communication. Primary responsible for creating presentation materials, plakater, and visual assets for the Hovfaret 13 project. Led stakeholder mapping and neighbor coordination. Works closely with Linda Marie Aas on operational project management. Coordinates with R21 Arkitekter on architectural deliverables.

knut_halvor_hogseth.name: Knut Halvor Høgseth
knut_halvor_hogseth.title: Building Consultant
knut_halvor_hogseth.role_in_project: Technical building consultant - structural and construction advice

trym_osborg.name: Trym Osborg
trym_osborg.title: Climate Consultant
trym_osborg.role_in_project: Climate calculations and LCA analysis - key contact person for Natural State
trym_osborg.bio: Climate consultant at Vill Energi AS (St. Olavs plass 2, 0165 Oslo). Served as Natural State's primary contact person for climate calculations on Hovfaret 13. Coordinated the critical 'Klimagassberegninger Hovfaret 13 v2' report (April 2025) that proved rehabilitation has 48% lower CO2 emissions than demolition/rebuild. This analysis became the cornerstone of the project's sustainability argument.
trym_osborg.notes: Key technical contributor whose work provided the scientific basis for the transformation argument

ingrid_hopp.name: Ingrid Hopp
ingrid_hopp.title: Bydelsdirektør
ingrid_hopp.role_in_project: Key government contact for Omsorg+ partnership discussions
ingrid_hopp.bio: District Director (Bydelsdirektør) of Bydel Ullern. Met with project team on May 22, 2025 together with Tore Strandskog. Critical contact for evaluating Omsorg+ scenario viability, as Bydel Ullern would be the potential partner/client for elderly housing units. Her support is essential for the Omsorg+ concept to move forward.
ingrid_hopp.notes: Met with project team May 2025. Critical for Omsorg+ scenario viability.

bente_otto.name: Bente Otto
bente_otto.title: Avdelingsdirektør - Helse, mestring og tilrettelagte tjenester
bente_otto.role_in_project: Key contact for health and care services - directly relevant to Omsorg+ concept
bente_otto.bio: Department Director for Health, Coping and Adapted Services at Bydel Ullern. Has direct oversight of elderly care needs in the district, making her a crucial stakeholder for validating demand for Omsorg+ housing. Met with project team to discuss specific requirements for elderly housing and care services that would align with Husbanken standards.
bente_otto.notes: Meeting May 5, 2025 to discuss Omsorg+ housing needs

james_lorentzen.name: James Stove Lorentzen
james_lorentzen.title: Byråd for byutvikling
james_lorentzen.bio: City Councillor for Urban Development (Byråd for byutvikling) in Oslo. Met with project team in January 2024 and initially expressed interest in the transformation approach as a potential model for sustainable building reuse in Oslo. However, later withdrew active support, leaving the project to navigate the area plan (områdeplan) requirements through other channels.
james_lorentzen.notes: Met January 2024. Expressed interest in transformation approach but later withdrew active support.

Core Team.description: Primary project team members with regular involvement
